cont.entity_a: The mouse stopped working after a few years, likely due to being dropped. Durable and withstands being dropped and tossed around. Durable after three years of use with cosmetic damage only.
cont.entity_b: Spacebar broke after 4 weeks of infrequent use. Mouse left button works intermittently. Spacebar gets locked up after a while.

cont.entity_a: Mouse battery life is about 2 weeks. Keyboard still works fine with a battery life of 6 months. Batteries drain quickly if devices are not turned off. Good battery life with rechargeable batteries.
cont.entity_b: Low battery warnings appear daily. Mouse consumes batteries quickly.

cont.entity_a: Compatible with Windows MediaCenter 2005. Compatible with both media center and desktop use.
cont.entity_b: Keyboard and mouse work well with iogear KVM switch.

cont.entity_a: Bluetooth adapter lacks support for audio devices. Bluetooth adapter only works with the provided keyboard and mouse. Good reception with Bluetooth. Bluetooth has a great range.

The system works well for operating a PC connected to a TV. Easy to set up and use, though the 'WIN' key is confusing. Not ergonomic due to lack of elevation change and slight curve. Good for media use but not for daily typing.
cont.entity_b: Installation is easy but software is outdated.

cont.entity_a: Lightweight and responsive compared to previous models. Keyboard is low profile and barely visible on a flat surface. Compact design takes up little space. Design is nice and works well, but lacks a number pad.
cont.entity_b: Keyboard form is easy on hands and mouse has a light touch. Keys are widespread, not suitable for small hands.

cont.entity_a: Not suitable for production use due to minimal key travel and lack of a numeric keypad. Odd escape and function keys. No Forward key and USB dongle is locked to the keyboard and mouse pair. Keyboard is sleek and light but has a minute lag. No number pad and touch-sensitive function keys are overly sensitive.
cont.entity_b: Keyboard has a light touch and white keys are easy to see in the dark. Five configurable hotkeys and dedicated keys for mail and internet. Keyboard missed every 3rd or 4th letter typed. Keyboard quality is not as good as previous models. Keyboard skips letters when typing fast. Keyboard keys are hard to read under certain lighting.

cont.entity_a: Mouse is responsive enough to use on the arm of a chair. Includes a recharging cradle for the mouse. Mouse has been unreliable, sometimes not working.
cont.entity_b: Magnification feature on the mouse is useful for enlarging fine print. Mouse is very accurate and has a zoom function. Mouse movement is fine, but scroll-wheel lacks good feel. Laser mouse is precise and quick. Mouse is ambidextrous, useful for switching hands. Mouse and keyboard have continual connection problems. Mouse RF receiver has serious syncing problems. Mouse pointer jumps and doesn't track correctly. Mouse control is great.

cont.entity_a: Significant lag from the first keypress or mouse movement after power-on.
cont.entity_b: No problems with missed keys when typing lightly.
Microsoft technical support is difficult to contact.

cont.entity_a: The product was not as pictured, leading to dissatisfaction.
